シングルモードのみプレイ。

◎良かったところ
・シナリオ、キャラクター
　前作より直接繋がった続編なので、舞台はもちろん前作に登場したキャラクターもいます。新キャラクターや新しい仕掛けもありますが旧キャラの掘り下げもしっかりされており、世界観をうまく広げています。シナリオも最後はキレイに終わるので満足できる作品でした。

・総評・
大きなシステム変更はなく、グラフィック向上や新ギミックやシナリオ性の向上もあり特に目立つような悪い点も無かったので良かったです。CO-OPやってないのでそのあたりは考慮していませんが、シングルモードだけでも楽しいと思います。

Super jeu de logique avec une histoire on s'y prend vraiment j'adore :)
好游戏，有些关卡做得很有创意。第六还是第七章差评，一直在找路 完全是考验眼神。通关之后的歌，怎么说，就好像一群严肃的工程师在你面前，手舞足蹈，边唱边对叫 “勇士，你通关了！你听到我们的歌声啦！这是你应得的！哟，我们都好棒！”

Portal 2 consegue ser melhor em tudo do que o 1, com puzzle mais difíceis, uma campanha muito maior e mais desafiadora e com novas mecânicas de jogo, além de um cooperativo muito bom para se jogar com os amigos e quebrar a cabeça tentando passar todos os testes, se você gostou do 1 vai amar o 2.

Sem dúvidas um dos melhores jogos que você poderá jogar, tanto single quanto o multiplayer, Portal 2 é uma obra prima  atemporal, ouso dizer que está no seleto grupo de jogos que atingiram a perfeição!

재미있는 게임
传送门2的关卡比一代更难了一些，但可玩性也增加了不少，缺点就是片尾曲没有1代的好听。

Portal2是我玩过的策略、益智类游戏中最具开拓性的游戏，游戏关卡从小到大、从难到易的设计非常的细致精妙，不断提高益智乐趣，游戏中不断探索新的通关途径。游戏最大的难点就是对传送门的理解，借用一些道具，天衣无缝的实现与传送门之间的衔接，当然通关中的每一个道具都不是白给的，只有将它们串联起来才能紧早的过关。
过关要领：
细心观察每一关的环境和使用道具
尝试那些白色墙体是否可以链接传送门
当然有些道具本身就只是个摆设，不要被其所欺骗
最后祝愿所有的portal迷早日通关

The game makes you feel clever, and it's funny as hell. I wouldn't buy the game at full price as I find the experience rather short; you can only play a puzzle once before the fun of solving it is lost. If you are buying it for the multiplayer, find a friend as playing with a random person is frustrating and not nearly as enjoyable as when playing with a someone you know and can talk to.

One of the best games I have ever played. Here is why;

Pros:
- Amazing physics
- Smooth gameplay; I was expecting fps drop when going through portals but I have been proved wrong
- Compelling story; I love wheatly and glados
- Brilliant puzzles; I have to give credit to the devs for coming up with some of the levels
- Co-op is one of the best I have played in my life; especially considering it is a puzzle game
- Lots of Replayability thanks to mods and user generated content

Cons:
- Having bought and completed this game before Portal (1), it now makes the first game look bad in comparison, but I am not complaining! Both are great games.

Overall:
Get this game. Well worth the full price. Or if you are still not sure it usually goes for extremely cheap on sales.

great co-op

Portal 2 is the best puzzle game I have ever played. Every puzzle is designed to challange your mind and your patience. It is a worthy sequel to Portal 1, and has been improved in almost every way.

[h1]Postitives[/h1]
- Solid story that is intriguing and interesting
- The lore has been given tons of depth. You learn much more about GLaDOs and Chell, the main protagonist. You also learn more about Aperture Science and it's creater, Cave Johnson.
- The characters are more fleshed out and more interesting.
- All the puzzles are great, and some are much harder than anything in Portal 1.
- Much more detail in the enviorments compared to Portal 1, along with improved graphics and engine.
- Challange Mode makes a return, combining Fewest portals and Lowest Time together.
- Co-op mode is introduced, which is genius! It's been masterfully crafted and it's been given lots of thought. There's tons of useful tools like seeing what your partner sees using TAB, using F to set a waypoint on where you want your partner to look, and other useful stuff like timers and different symbols for the waypoint.
- There is Steam Workshop support, where there are singleplayer and co-op maps created by the community. This gives the game infinite life and so much content.
- This game runs on the Source engine, which can run on almost any computer within reason. A 5 year old GPU can most likely run this game at reasonable resolution and settings.

[h1]Negatives[/h1]
- I can't think of any, but if I was to be forced to put one, it would be that it would be nice if the story was a bit longer. 5-6 hours is great for a type of game like Portal, but something like 8 or even 10 hours would've been fantastic.

[h1]Summary[/h1]
Portal 2 is a legendary puzzle game. It's nearly perfect in every way, from story, gameplay, setting, atmosphere, lore, depth, and many more things. It's worth every penny!

Should you buy it? [b]YES![/b] I would recommend getting the Portal bundle as the first game is also really good.

Make Portal 3 happen, Valve. PLEASE

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/reanimatee/recommended/400/]My review on Portal 1[/url]

The one concern I had about buying this game was that the main campaign is very short (10-15 hours). But the online community is very active and there are thousands upon thousands of user-submitted puzzles that keep the game fresh and fun. As long as you have the itch to play the game there's always something new to do. The campaign alone is a blast and a must-play; all the online content on top of that more than makes this a worthwhile purchase. Just buy it; it's great.
Wonderful, mind-boggling puzzle game with an intriguing story.

Portal 2, a game you NEED to play, a fun puzzle game with loads of jokes and laughs. Even if you only play singleplayer witout dipping into the Coop or custom chambers, you'll still get at least 5 playthroughs (I know I did). Coop adds another storyline taking place after the main singleplayer (Dont quote me on that) with just as many jokes as the singleplayer. The custom chambers can add an additional but simple storyline to the game. [spoiler] Hail our lord and saviour Cave Johnson and the worlds made of solid money [/spoiler]

In short; This is a game with laughs left right and centre, If you have a couple of bucks burning a hole your pocket, get this game, trust me you wont regret it.
